## Description {#details}

Option to specify a tag for the node type.

This option allows a single value type to be inserted in multiple lists simultaneously. See <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node">ilist&#95;node</a></em> for usage examples.

Definition at line 32 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/ilist-node-options-h">ilist&#95;node&#95;options.h</a>.
